brief: Update the image viewer to specifically handle SVG images. Add zoom in/out controls (+/- buttons), pan functionality (drag to move the SVG), and a reset button to return to original view. Show file format info (PNG/JPEG/SVG) below the image. Improve the UI with a dark theme and better controls.
